article_title: Wayne Goodwin: Fixing the ACA’s problems
article_text: Last fall federal Health and Human Services Secretary Sylvia Burwell asked me to write her a letter outlining concerns I have about North Carolina’s health insurance market. A Feb. 3 News & Observer story about that letter evoked a firestorm of reaction – positive and negative – and left people uncertain about my views on the Affordable Care Act.
